cz.melkamar.andruian.viewlink.data.place

Class PlaceFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.melkamar.andruian.viewlink.data.place.PlaceFetcher

  • public class PlaceFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides places-fetching functionality. It implements both index server-based querying and naive SPARQL querying. Both types of querying are delegated to their respective classes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PlaceFetcher.FetchPlacesResult
      A wrapper class for a result of a query.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlaceFetcher.FetchPlacesResult fetchPlaces(BaseView view, DataDef dataDef, double latitude, double longitude, double radius)
      Fetch all places defined by this PlaceFetcher's DataDef.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • fetchPlaces

        public PlaceFetcher.FetchPlacesResult fetchPlaces(BaseView view,
                                                  DataDef dataDef,
                                                  double latitude,
                                                  double longitude,
                                                  double radius)
                                           throws PlaceFetchException
        Fetch all places defined by this PlaceFetcher's DataDef. If possible, use an index server. If that does not work or is not defined, resort to contacting the SPARQL endpoint.
        Parameters:
        latitude - The latitude coordinate of the point around which to query data.
        longitude - The longitude coordinate of the point around which to query data.
        radius - The radius in which to query for data, in kilometers.
        Returns:
        A PlaceFetcher.FetchPlacesResult object containing the result of the query.
        Throws:
        PlaceFetchException
